lead_paragraph: When Mattie Appleyard is released from prison, he intends to use the money he has saved to start a general store with a couple of his friends. But the banker and his former jailer plan to keep this from happening.
snippet: When Mattie Appleyard is released from prison, he intends to use the money he has saved to start a general store with a couple of his friends. But the banker and his former jailer plan to keep this from happening.
